name: about:blank - LavaFox & BlackFox - Orion's Belt
description:
Alternative style for the about:blank page and newTab.
The screenshots demonstrate the effect. 
Works only for LavaFox and BlackFox Firefox Thenes by Zigboom Designs: 
https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/developers/addons 
EnjoY!

discussions.name: You should make it available to everyone, not just to your themes users
